description:
Comic Coloring Book includes a series of 4-picture stories that will take every kid into a great world of fun and friendship. You can find here cool illustrations, friendly colors, engaging stories, and a guaranteed portion of joy.

Drawing Without Borders
In this mode, you can draw your own comics. Want to take your coloring heroes on a new adventure? Or maybe you have an idea for completely new characters? Use the convenient tools, great colors, and comic book stickers. Just don't forget to share your pictures later!
name: Comic Coloring Book: Drawing Without Borders
